import React, { useState } from 'react' import i18n from '../translation/i18n'; const Header = ({setTheme}) => { const [theme, settheme] = useState("light") function changeLanguage(e) { i18n.changeLanguage(e.target.value); } const isChangeTheme = (event) => { const value = event.target.value settheme(value) setTheme(value) } return (
) } export default Header
